summary: LETTER FROM CONGRESSMAN WEBSTER ON BEHALF OF CONSTITUENT RE TO A MERCEDES-BENZ RECALL BUT THE CONSTITUENT IS CONCERNED OVER HIS SAFETY SINCE HE HAS RECEIVED NO NEWS ONTO WHEN THE REPLACEMENT WILL BE DONE FROM EITHER DEALERSHIP. *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE RECALL REPAIR EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME TO BE REPAIRED. *JS
